Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Doll = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local activeSound
local equipped
local assetAwarded = false
function returnToDefault() wait(4.0) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) end
-- Randomly awards or removes assets from you function annoy() while equipped and myTorso and myHumanoid do tick() local randomElement = math.random(1, 100) if randomElement == 1 then -- local AOE = Vector3.new(14, 14, 14) local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i].Character and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") then local torso = players[i].Character.Torso local distance = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 12 and vPlayer:FindFirstChild("Backpack") then activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("HereYouGo") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end local randomItem = vPlayer.Backpack:GetChildren()[math.random(1, #vPlayer.Backpack:GetChildren())] randomItem.Parent = game.Workspace if randomItem:FindFirstChild("Handle") then randomItem.Handle.Velocity = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).unit * 30.0 end end end end elseif randomElement > 1 and randomElement < 4 and not assetAwarded then -- Award asset local asset = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(19704172) asset = asset:GetChildren()[1] asset.Parent = vPlayer.Backpack assetAwarded = true activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("HereYouGo2") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end elseif randomElement > 4 and randomElement < 9 then if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.Sit = true end activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("TakeThisNoob") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end elseif randomElement > 9 and randomElement < 18 then if myHumanoid and myHumanoid.WalkSpeed == 16 then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 22.0 end activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("HereYouGo2") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end end
wait(1.5) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
tick()
if math.random() < 0.33 then Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, -2.75) elseif math.random() < 0.67 then Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 1.8, -1.7) else Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(3, 1.8, -1.7) end
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(returnToDefault))
wait(6.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() equipped = true vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(annoy)) end
function onUnequipped() if activeSound then activeSound:Stop() end equipped = false end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
